settings.title: Mission Statement
settings.content: At Sunniland Patio Furniture, our mission is to enhance your outdoor living experience by providing top-quality patio furniture and exceptional customer service.

settings.title: Tell your story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to give more information about your store, availability details...

settings.liquid:
History of Sunniland - The beginnings

Founded in 1972, SunnilandPatio has been providing a superior level of service in patio retail for more than 50 years.

We have been helping homeowners just like you enjoy better outdoor living. Our reputation for integrity, quality, and reliability sets the standard for the rest of the retail patio industry.

Founded in 1972, SunnilandPatio has been providing a superior level of service in patio retail for more than 50 years.

We have been helping homeowners just like you enjoy better outdoor living. Our reputation for integrity, quality, and reliability sets the standard for the rest of the retail patio industry.

settings.heading: Service
settings.content: We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service, going above and beyond to ensure your satisfaction and exceed your expectations.

settings.heading: Honesty & Fairness
settings.content: We believe in conducting business with integrity, maintaining transparent and honest practices in all our interactions, while treating everyone with fairness and respect.

settings.heading: Positive Impact
settings.content: We strive to keep furniture out of landfills by providing the tutorials and parts our customers need to refresh and reuse their old patio furniture.

settings.title: Values We Believe
settings.content:
Guided by our values of honesty, fairness, and approachability, we are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service, personalized recommendations, and a friendly atmosphere.

For the last 50 years we have been serving generations of families to build their dream patios. Inheriting the craft from his mother & father, Jeff Bender and his team of experts is here to help you find all your patio furniture and fixtures in one place!
